reviews.text: At Easton looking for sonething new and saw this place and figured I'd give it a shot.  Was a little concerned about the prices, especially since it is ala...
These sandwiches are crazy! There are so many tasty sounding things on the menu, but we went with the Crabby Catfish Sandwich and Hot Honey Garlic Chicken...
It was our first time here and we were pleasantly surprised. There parking around the area and garage at Easton. The restaurant itself was cold and somewhat...
